scheme_name: Training for Horticulture Skill Development for Self-Employment at Centre of Excellence
nodal_department: Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department
brief_description: The scheme "Training for Horticulture Skill Development for Self-Employment at Centre of Excellence " is aimed at promoting self-employment opportunities across all communities in Gujarat through practical and theoretical learning at the Centre of Excellence.
detailed_description: The scheme &quot;Training for Horticulture Skill Development for Self-Employment at Centre of Excellence&quot; introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to offer structured training programs ranging from 10 to 30 days, focusing on horticultural skills to enable self-employment. The program is tailored for individuals across all social categories, with subsidized training costs. Beneficiaries gain access to a complete learning experience, including expert sessions, training literature, educational tours, and practical kits.
benefits: Stipend: ₹250/- per trainee. Other Facilities: Dining facility, training literature kit, experiential education tour, trainee kit, etc.
eligibility_criteria:
The applicant must be a resident of Gujarat.
The applicant should belong to any of the following:
Agriculture Labour All Colleges All Farmers All Individuals All Students Anganwadi Worker College Students Farm Labourer Horticulturists Self-Employment Skilled Individual Small and Marginal Farmers Small, Marginal & Other Farmers

steps: Step 1: Obtain a plain paper application form from the District Office of the Deputy Director of Horticulture.
Step 2: Fill in the application form with accurate details. Attach the required documents.
Step 3: Submit the form to the District Office of the Deputy Director of Horticulture.

documents_required: Aadhaar Card. Bank Pass Book/Cancelled Cheque. Ration Card. True Copy of Election Card.
